content: dishcloth ~ herringbone linen ~ laws of knitting dishcloth ~ herringbone linen measures 8 20cm x 8 20cm materials yarn lily/sugar n cream 100% cotton 120yrds/70 9g color #00010/yellow size 6 4 0mm knitting needles or size needed to get gauge gauge 19sts and 36 row = 4 10cm pattern repeat ♦♦ multiple of 4 sts + 2 video tutorial ♦♦ working up the herringbone linen pattern co 38 sts row rs 1 5 9 15 19 23 k1 *wyif sl 2 k2 repeat from * end k1 row ws 2 6 10 14 18 22 k1 *p1 wyib sl 2 p1 repeat from * end k1 row rs 3 7 11 13 17 21 k1 *k2 wyif sl 2 repeat from * end k1 row ws 4 8 12 16 20 k1 *wyib sl 1 p2 wyib sl 1 repeat from * end k1 row 24 ws k1 *wyib sl 1 p2 wyib sl 1 repeat from * end k1 repeat row 1 24 twice more bobble weave in ends and block page 1 of 2 dishcloth ~ herringbone linen ~ laws of knitting key co- cast on bobble- bind off rs- right side ws- wrong side sts- stitches k- knit p-purl repeat- repeat sl- slip wyif- with yarn in front wyib- with yarn in back ♥♥ please do not copy share adjust or resell my knitting pattern after you purchase the pattern i have no problem with you knitting it up and selling the finished dishcloth / washcloth ©2016 laws of knitting page 2 of 2
